Dear Parent_E,

Thank you for your message and for your continued interest in Nursery_E.

At this stage, the main constraint is our priority order and the fact that we are still keeping the remaining place available while we assess whether any higher-priority families will be taking up places elsewhere and then approaching us. It is not an issue of start date, hours, or missing documentation on your side.

In terms of conditions under which we could reconsider: the only factor would be availability after higher-priority families have had a reasonable opportunity to come forward. If the place remains unfilled after that point, we would revisit the remaining applicants.

If you would like to stay in consideration, please let us know whether you are still able to accept immediately on short notice over the next rounds, and we will keep your details active.

Sincerely,
Nursery_E Admissions
